joke: "What's that?" A divorce jar. Every time we fight you put a dollar in and I'm a little bit closer to freedom. *puts in dollar* "WTH!?!"
translation: “那是什么？”一个离婚罐。每次我们吵架的时候你就往里面放一美元，我就离自由又近了一步。 *放一美元* “什么鬼！！”<|im_end|>

joke: If you have a parrot and you don't teach it to say,"Help, they've turned me into a parrot." you are wasting everybody's time.
translation: 如果你养了一只鹦鹉，却不教它说：“救命，他们把我变成一只鹦鹉了。”那你就是在浪费大家的时间。<|im_end|>

joke: My 8 y/o memorized my 12 character password that has upper and lowercase letters, numbers and symbols but can't remember to flush the toilet
translation: 我的8岁孩子记住了我的12位密码，包含大小写字母、数字和符号，但却忘了冲厕所。<|im_end|>

joke: Me: waiter, do you have frog legs? Waiter: of course monsieur Me: good, hop over there and get me a beer
translation: 服务员，你们有蛙腿吗？ 我说：有啊。我说：好的，跳过来给我拿瓶啤酒。<|im_end|>

joke: It's comforting to know that the US government works the same way as a college student when it comes to deadlines... They both wait until the last minute, then get an extension.
translation: 知道吗，美国政府在截止日期的事情上和大学生一个德性……都是拖到最后一分钟，然后申请延期。<|im_end|>

joke: What did the man with The World's Largest Penis say when he had to have his legs amputated "Don't worry, I still have my third one."
translation: 一个男人在失去双腿后，却依然拥有“世界上最大的 penis”，这是不是让你觉得有点困惑呢？下面是一个基于此背景的笑话的中文翻译：这个男人的腿被截肢后，他却说：“别担心，我仍然有我的第三条。”<|im_end|>

joke: What's the worse thing to do to a blind person? Leave a plunger in the toilet
translation: 盲人最不能做什么？不能让他在厕所里留下一个塞子。<|im_end|>

joke: When I was interviewed for a job in the chemistry department, they asked me if I had lab experience. I said I was more of a cat person.
translation: 当我在化学系面试时，他们问我是否有实验室工作经验，我回答说我是更喜欢猫的人。<|im_end|>

joke: Two skeptics walk into a bar.. I'd tell you what happens next but noone knows
translation: 两个怀疑论者走进一家酒吧……接下来发生了什么？我本会告诉你，但没人知道。<|im_end|>

joke: Everytime you pull the trigger a bullet loses its job...HAHAHAHA! Because it gets FIRED. HAHAHA! *I'm in tears*
translation: 每次你扣动扳机，就会有一颗子弹失去它的职位……哈哈哈！因为它被“击”了。哈哈哈！ *我笑到流泪*<|im_end|>

joke: It would be great to be born on Earth and die on Mars. Preferably not on the point of impact.
translation: 能在地球出生，在火星死去，那该多好。当然最好是死在撞击的时候。<|im_end|>

joke: Descartes walks into the bar. The bartender asks him, "will you have your usual tonight?" Rene replies "I think not" and he disappears.
translation: 笛卡尔走进酒吧，调酒师问他：“今天还要和上次一样吗？”笛卡尔回答：“我想不是这样”，说完就消失不见了。<|im_end|>

joke: Anyone want to hear my Human Centipede joke? Nah, I won't tell you it. It sucks ass.
translation: 有人想听我那个《人体蜈蚣》的笑话吗？ Nah，我不告诉你，我都不想听了。<|im_end|>

joke: My dog can predict when an earthquake is going to happen. But television doorbell versus actual doorbell baffles him every time.
translation: 我的狗能预测地震什么时候发生。但是每次他对门铃 versus 电视门铃都感到困惑。<|im_end|>

joke: My favorite knock knock joke. I need someone to start it ... Someone start the knock knock joke ...
translation: 我最喜欢的“谁敲敲敲敲敲”笑话。需要有人开头……有人开头讲讲“谁敲敲敲敲敲”笑话吧……<|im_end|>

joke: My Parents asked me what i wanted for christmas... I said i want something to wear and something to play with. So they got me a pair of pants with the pockets cut out.
translation: 我的父母问我想要 Christmas 什么礼物，我说我想得到一些穿的和玩的。于是他们给我买了一条没有口袋的裤子。<|im_end|>

joke: With 10K characters, I can finally get into great detail about how I'm not allowed at the company family picnic any more!
translation: 用10K字符，我 finally 可以详细说明为什么我再也不被允许参加公司家庭野餐了！<|im_end|>

joke: [at my funeral] So young, how did he die? He ran into oncoming traffic after walking past a group of adults saying the word "bae"
translation: 【在我葬礼上】这么年轻，他是怎么去世的？他是走在一群大人说“bae”的人旁边之后，跑进了对面的车流。<|im_end|>

joke: Stealing my little brother's (fellow Redditor) original joke, hope he sees it and is pissed. What do you get when you cross a pig and a Christmas tree...? A Porky-Pine
translation: 偷了我弟弟（另一位redditor）的 ORIGINAL 谐音梗，希望他能看到会生气。那你可能会得到什么，当你把猪和圣诞树交叉一下……？一个“火腿云杉”（Porky-Pine）。Description: 这个翻译尽量保留了原文的意思和幽默感。"Porky-Pine" 在这里被翻译成了“火腿云杉”，既保留了谐音的效果，也尽量让中文读者能够理解这个梗。<|im_end|>

joke: I lost my virginity to a retarded girl last night. I wanted it to be special
translation: 昨晚我失去处女膜的时候是个傻瓜女孩，我想让它变得特别一点。<|im_end|>

joke: What is the biggest compliment you can pay at a gay bar? Pushing in somebody's stool.
translation: 你能在同性酒吧里给对方最大的 compliment 是推了对方的凳子一把。<|im_end|>

joke: What's a pirate's favourite type of weaponry? It's ARRRtillery! bonus: A pirate's favourite melee weapon? A scimitARRR
translation: 海盗最喜欢的武器类型是什么？是ARRRtillery（音译自“大炮”artillery）！额外的：海盗最喜欢的近战武器是scimitARRR（音译自“剑”scimitar）。<|im_end|>

joke: Hey, who did you vote for?... I wrote in Michael J. Fox. I think he can really shake things up!
translation: 你投给谁了呀？……我投给了迈克尔·J·福克斯，我觉得他能把事情彻底搞乱！<|im_end|>

joke: I once had a crippiling masturbation addiction... ...now i have a sex addiction, could you say my addiction has gotten out of hand?
translation: 我曾经有过令我身心俱疲的自慰成瘾……现在我有了性成瘾，你可以说我的成瘾已经失去控制了吗？<|im_end|>

joke: *Guy tries giving me his phone number* Me: Oh no thank you. I already have one
translation: 输入：*一个 guy 给我他的电话号码* 我说：哦 不用了，谢谢，我已经有一个了。<|im_end|>

joke: I'm glad it's the thought that counts because I spend all day thinking about the shit I should be doing.
translation: 我很高兴事情不是这样要求的，因为我的确有很多该做的事情在思考。<|im_end|>

joke: A man balks in a war He is discharged for dereliction of duty and takes up drinking.
translation: 一名男子在戰爭中失職，被開除軍籍，之後開始酗酒。<|im_end|>

joke: Yo mama so lazy she thinks a two-income  family is where yo daddy has two jobs.
translation: Yo妈真是太懒了，她认为双收入家庭就是你爸有两份工作。<|im_end|>

joke: Breaking Bad is my favorite documentary about what it takes to be an entrepreneur while balancing family life.
translation: 《绝命毒师》是我最喜欢的关于如何平衡家庭生活的同时成为企业家的纪录片。<|im_end|>

joke: What did the gay guy say to his lover when they were going on vacation? "Hey, can you help me pack my shit?"
translation: 同性恋者和他的情人在去度假，同性恋者会对他的爱人说些什么？“嘿，你能帮我打包我的东西吗？”<|im_end|>

joke: Coworker: Stop Me: collaborate and listen Coworker: Don't Me: you forget about me Coworker: Hey! Me: teacher, leave them kids alone
translation: 译文: 公司同事：阻止我：合作并倾听 公司同事：不要管我：你忘了我 公司同事：嘿！ 我：老师，别管这些孩子了。<|im_end|>

joke: What's an extroverted accountant? One who looks at your shoes while he's talking to you instead of his  own.
translation: 外向的会计师是什么样的？就是跟你说话的时候还看你鞋子的会计师。<|im_end|>

joke: Dear President Obama, I've got a joke for you... I texted it to Angela Merkel. Did you... *get it*?
translation: 亲爱的奥巴马总统，我有一个笑话要跟你说……我是发短信给安格拉·默克尔的。你……get it（get it有“明白过来”和“开玩笑了”的双重含义）？<|im_end|>

joke: Sorry, but breaking up with you on facebook was the best way of letting all your friends know I'm available.
translation: 抱歉，但是通过在 Facebook 上和你分手的方式来让所有朋友知道我已经有心仪的对象了，才是最好的方式。<|im_end|>

joke: I don't understand women. I also don't understand how a car works but I still drive it.
translation: 我不懂女人。我也不懂汽车是怎么工作的，但lient仍然会开车。<|im_end|>

joke: What are the 3 stages of sex after marriage? Tri-weekly Try Weekly and Try Weakly
translation: 婚后性生活的三个阶段是什么？每周三次、每周一次和每周无力一次。<|im_end|>

joke: My girlfriend is great in bed... But I don't know how my best friend would know that.
translation: 我的女朋友床上功夫很好……但我也不知道我最好的朋友是怎么知道的。<|im_end|>

joke: [Justice League HQ] SUPERMAN: Looks like Batman is hungry tonight MOTHMAN: [visibly sweating] I think I'll just fight daytime crimes
translation: [正义联盟总部] 超人：看来今晚蝙蝠侠要去吃晚饭了。 莫斯曼：（明显出汗）我还是去解决白天的犯罪吧。<|im_end|>

joke: My favourite word is snigger It allows me to be sracist without speople sthinking I'm a sbad sperson
translation: 我最喜欢的词是窃笑。它让我能够进行种族歧视同时又不让人们认为我是一个坏人。<|im_end|>

joke: How do you hide an elephant in a fridge? You remove his slippers and open the door . You put him inside. You close the door and take the slippers away.
translation: 怎样在冰箱里藏一只大象？你先要帮他脱掉鞋子，然后打开冰箱门，把大象放进去，接着关门，再把鞋子拿走。<|im_end|>

joke: Pete and repeat are in a boat Pete and repeat are brothers. Pete falls overboard, who's left?
translation: 佩特和重复在一条船上，佩特和重复是兄弟。佩特掉到水里了，谁留下了？<|im_end|>

joke: What did Arnold Schwarzenegger say to the gym manager when he was joining a new gym? I'll re-rack.
translation: 阿诺德·施瓦辛格在加入新健身房时会对健身房经理说些什么？我会重新整理。<|im_end|>

joke: Right now a group of women at a baby shower are simultaneously saying, "Awwww..." while some knocked up chick holds up a tiny pair of socks.
translation: 现在一群女人在参加一个婴儿茶会，同时发出“哇……”的声音，而某个怀孕的女人举着一双小小的袜子。<|im_end|>

joke: Gentlemen test At least most tests have the decency to ask me my name, before they fuck me.
translation: 这个段子的中文翻译可以是：“ gentlemen's test 至少大多数测试都有 decency 在问我名字之前先‘测试’我一下。 ” 注意，这个翻译可能对某些读者来说仍然可能不太合适，因为原句中的“fuck”一词在这里被保留了其粗俗的含义。在中文中，我们通常会寻找更委婉的方式来表达类似的意思。<|im_end|>

joke: I went in to hospital for an operation... I asked the anaesthetist if I could administer the needle myself, and he said: "Sure, knock yourself out".
translation: 我去医院做手术……我跟麻药师说要自己来打麻药，他答应了，还说：“随便你。”<|im_end|>

joke: A piece of shit walks into a bar It's my dad... My dad is a piece of shit.
translation: 一个屎蛋走进一家酒吧……这就是我爸爸……我爸爸就是个屎蛋。Note: This translation uses a colloquial and vulgar expression "屎蛋" (shí dàn) which means "shit" or "poop" in a more informal context. The joke is a play on words and cultural references, so the translation tries to convey the meaning and intent of the original joke as closely as possible while being appropriate for the Chinese language.<|im_end|>

joke: What is the last thing that tickle-me elmo gets before he leaves the factory? Two test tickles
translation: 在工厂里,Tickle-me Elmo 最后会做的一件事是什么? 会在离开工厂前互相挠两下。<|im_end|>

joke: What do you get when you cross a sheep stealer with royalty? Mutton Looter King
translation: 你把羊偷了之后还会怎么样？羊贼国王。<|im_end|>

joke: An Indian redditor gets an arranged marriage. He turns to his partner and says: "Thanks for the gold, kind stranger!"
translation: 一位印度的 redditor 遇到了包办婚姻。他转头对他的伴侣说：“谢谢你提供的金子，好心的陌生人！”<|im_end|>

joke: What do you tell a woman with two black eyes? ..........Nothing you've already told her twice!
translation: 两个眼睛都是黑青色的女人听了你什么话都会哭，所以你最好什么也别说。<|im_end|>

joke: I'd kill for a microwave that plays Europe's "The Final Countdown" during the last 30 seconds.
translation: 我愿意为了能在最后30秒播放欧洲乐队“欧洲”演唱的《最后的倒计时》的微波炉而付出生命。<|im_end|>

joke: Did you hear about the skeleton who didn't go to prom? He had no body to go with.
translation: 你听说那个没去参加舞会的骷髅了吗？他连个陪衬都没有。<|im_end|>

joke: What do you call it when a jugaloo sleeps with his girlfriend after a fight? Make up sex.
translation: jugaloo 争执过后，当jugaloo和女朋友和好如初时，你管这叫什么？弥补性行为。<|im_end|>

joke: Kids are like farts. You don't mind your own, but others peoples are just unbearable
translation: 孩子们就像放屁一样，自己的放屁可以忍受，但别人的放屁就无法忍受了。<|im_end|>

joke: Over the past year, my sexual fetishes have been slowly getting more perverse. But it wasn't until I spanked a statue that I realised I'd hit rock bottom.
translation: 在过去的一年里，我的性癖好逐渐变得越来越变态。但是直到我打了一个雕像，我才意识到自己已经堕落到 rock bottom（ rock bottom 指的是一种比喻，直译为“岩石的底部”，常用来形容最低点或无法更低的状态）那种程度。 翻译：在过去的一年里，我的性癖好逐渐变得越来越变态。但是直到我打了 statues（这里 statues 指雕像，直译为“岩石”，但不妥当，所以用“雕像”），我才意识到自己已经堕落到最低谷。<|im_end|>

joke: I milked the cow "We don't have a cow" the neighbors' cow then "Their cat?" Pretty sure it was a cow he was saying moo "Meow" Ah shoot
translation: 输入：我挤了牛奶 "我们没有奶牛" 邻居家的奶牛然后 "她们家的猫？" 我肯定他说的是牛 "喵" 哦糟了<|im_end|>

joke: Dear Shirtless Guy in his Profile Pic, You REALLY want to impress girls? Get a job & pose in front of your cubicle.
translation: 亲爱的裸上身的家伙，你想赢得女孩的青睐？还是赶紧去找份工作，在你的办公桌前拍张照片吧。<|im_end|>

joke: The IRA have been fighting for Irish reunification since the 70s. . . All they needed to do was vote for the Conservatives.
translation: 自20世纪70年代以来，爱尔兰共和军（IRA）一直在为爱尔兰统一而斗争……他们只需要投票支持保守党就行了。<|im_end|>

joke: How many Reddit admins does it take to change a lightbulb? None, they like to keep the mods in the dark.
translation: 有多少Reddit管理员才能换灯泡？不用换，他们喜欢让mod们不明真相。<|im_end|>

joke: Facebook buys Instagram for one billion?!? Idiots!! They could have downloaded it from the app store for .99 cents..
translation: 脸书花一亿美元收购Instagram？！ 大傻瓜！他们从应用商店下载都可以只要99美分。<|im_end|>

joke: I may not be getting laid tonight, but I'm definitely banging my snooze button in the morning.
translation: 今晚可能没有女人陪我，但是早晨我会多次赖床。<|im_end|>

joke: I want to make a series about the murder of an airline crew but I still have to shoot the pilot.
translation: 我想拍一个关于空乘人员被杀的系列剧，但我也得先拍那个飞行员。<|im_end|>

joke: My friend always wanted to work in animation, but never got past the interview He just couldn't understand the difference between a professional "colorist" and a professional "racist"
translation: 我的朋友一直梦想着从事动画行业，但是每次面试都失败了。他总是分不清“专业的调色师”和“专业的种族主义者”之间的区别。<|im_end|>

joke: [sees a zebra for the first time] What's up with that horse? [sees a giraffe for the first time] Okay, what the hell is going on today?
translation: [第一次看到斑马] 这是什么样的马呀？[第一次看到长颈鹿] 靠，今天这是怎么了？<|im_end|>

joke: so as I went in to vote this morning, an old lady told me to make sure I voted for the candidate that could make change. Boy, is my bank teller going to be surprised!
translation: 今天早上我去投票的时候，一位老妇人告诉我一定要投给会找零钱的候选人。天哪，我那位银行柜员小姐得多惊讶啊！<|im_end|>

joke: You're so fat and unfunny... that the only punchlines you have are stained on your shirt.
translation: 你既胖又不好笑，连你的幽默梗都印在衣服上了。<|im_end|>

joke: Glue is weird it's all like hey I want to stick these pieces of paper together wait I have an idea hand me that dead horse
translation: 胶水真是奇怪，它总是这样：嘿，我想把这些纸粘在一起，等一下，我想到了一个主意，把那匹死马递给我。<|im_end|>

joke: Why are women and children evacuated first in a disaster? So we can think about a solution in silence
translation: 为什么灾难来临时要先让妇女和儿童撤离？因为这样我们可以安静地想个解决办法。<|im_end|>

joke: Waiting for the day when a girl finally says that I'm "the one," but isn't talking to a police officer.
translation: 等待着有一天有个女孩终于说我“就是你一直在找的人”，但她并不是在跟一个警察说话。<|im_end|>

joke: Some people say Glenn Frey got pneumonia from the cold... But that can't be true because he said the Heat is On.
translation: 有些人说 Glenn Frey 是因为感冒而得了肺炎……但这不可能是真的，因为他说热力四射（The Heat is On 是 Glenn Frey 的一首歌名，这里是一种双关的表达）。<|im_end|>

joke: What is the best part about having sex with 23 year olds? There's 20 of them. (Works better in person)
translation: 这个笑话的中文翻译如下：和23岁的对象做爱最好的地方在于有20个。 （现场效果更佳）<|im_end|>

joke: My love for you is like a fart. Everything about it is powered by my heart.
translation: 我对你的爱就像放屁一样，每一份都是由我的心驱动的。<|im_end|>

joke: What did the Mexican gang member say when two large houses fell on him during an earthquake? Get off me, homes.
translation: 地震时有两个大房子压在墨西哥黑帮成员身上，他怎么说？“Get off me, homes.”（快点从我身上,application: get off我， guys.）（应用了get off和homes这两个词组的双关）<|im_end|>

joke: I once bought an e. e. cummings poem collection.. It was the worst game of Mad Libs ever.
translation: 我曾经买过一本E.E. 庞德的诗集——这可能是有史以来最糟糕的Mad Libs游戏。<|im_end|>

joke: Why is it that the more numbers someone has in their e-mail address, the less I respect them?
translation: 为什么邮箱地址里的数字越多，我就越不尊重他们呢？<|im_end|>

joke: If you ever need help learning C++, I can give you some pointers. And you can keep me as a reference.
translation: 如果你需要帮助学习C++，我可以给你提供一些参考建议。而且你也可以把我当作一个参考。<|im_end|>

joke: What have you done wrong if the wife keep complaining when you try to watch TV in the living room? You made the chain too long in the kitchen.
translation: 如果妻子在你试图在客厅看电视时一直抱怨,那说明你干了什么? 说明你把厨房的链子弄长了。<|im_end|>

joke: Don't buy whitening toothpaste It says guaranteed whiteness in 14 days. 15 days have come and gone... and I am still asian.
translation: 不要买美白牙膏，包装上写着保证14天变白。15天过去了……我还是黄种人。<|im_end|>

joke: Simba - "welcome to... The bone zone" Nala - "the what?" Simba - "elephant graveyard. I said elephant graveyard"
translation: 辛巴：“欢迎来到……骨堆区。”娜拉：“什么骨堆区？”辛巴：“大象墓地。我说的是大象墓地。”<|im_end|>

joke: How are doctors so well tempered even under heavy stress? They have a lot of patients
translation: 在高压环境下，医生们却依然性情温和？那是因为他们要经常安抚众多病人。<|im_end|>

joke: I wonder if dog's had facebook, would they put our picture as their profile picture.
translation: 我想起一个关于狗和Facebook的笑话：如果狗有Facebook，它们会不会把我们的照片设为自己的个人照片呢？<|im_end|>

joke: Why are Native Americans the most successfull strippers? Because when they dance, they make it rain.
translation: 为什么原住民是最成功的脱衣舞者？因为他们跳舞的时候，总是“下雨”（意为给小费）。<|im_end|>

joke: My ex-girlfriend was a slut. She bust more nuts than a pistachio junkie. edit: Going through a potential breakup, so if you see this, this isnt about you, babe. Dont leave me, please.
translation: 我的前女友是个花心的。她比开心果上瘾者还爱抛媚眼。// 更新：正处于一段感情的讨论中，所以如果你看到了，这并不是在说你，亲爱的。请不要离开我。<|im_end|>

joke: Why Did the Ebola Patient Cross the Road? Trick question. There are no roads in Africa.
translation: 为什么埃博拉病患要过马路？这是一个陷阱问题。因为在非洲根本就没有公路。<|im_end|>

joke: ME: Haha you can tell them any name and they have to say it BARISTA: I have a latte for "A Person Who Deserves Love"? ME [crying]: Hahaha
translation: 输入：我说：哈哈，你可以随便给他们起个名字。 侍咖啡员说：有一杯给“值得爱的人”的拿铁。我说：哈哈（哭）。描述：一个顾客在咖啡店点了一杯特别的咖啡，咖啡的名字是“值得爱的人”，由此引发的幽默对话。<|im_end|>

joke: Peter Pan escaped the adult world... ...by becoming an alcoholic. He goes by Peter the Panhandler now.
translation: 彼得·潘逃离了成人世界……他是通过成为一名酒鬼实现的。现在他被称为彼得·潘handler。<|im_end|>

joke: My Grandfather had the heart of a lion and a lifetime ban from the zoo.
translation: 我爷爷有一颗狮子的心，却有一生不得进入动物园的禁令。<|im_end|>

joke: You just know I knew my girlfriend was furious when I blew my load early last night....I could see it in her eyes
translation: 你肯定能猜到，当我昨晚早泄的时候，我就知道我女朋友有多生气……从她的眼神就可以看出来了。<|im_end|>

joke: An atheist, a vegan, and a crossfit fanatic walk into a bar... Who talks more?
translation: 一个无神论者、一个素食者和一个CrossFit狂走进一家酒吧……谁说得更多？<|im_end|>

joke: How is light beer like having sex in a canoe? They're both fucking close to water.
translation: 啤酒为什么像在独木舟里做爱？因为两者都离水很近。<|im_end|>

joke: How many tickles does it take to make an octopus laugh? Ten-tickles. I'll see myself out.
translation: 有多少个挠痒痒才能让八爪鱼笑起来？十个挠痒痒。那我自行告辞了。<|im_end|>

joke: What do you get when you cross an insomniac, agnostic and a dyslexic? Someone who stays up all night wondering if there is a Dog.
translation: 一个失眠的、怀疑论的和阅读有困难的人交叉之后会得到什么？整晚都在琢磨世界上是否存在一只“狗”的人。<|im_end|>

joke: I farted in the Apple store and everyone got pissed at me. Not my fault they don't have Windows.
translation: 我在苹果店里放了个屁，大家都很生气。这不能怪我用的是Windows系统。<|im_end|>

joke: I left Stephen Hawking like 8 voice mail messages before I realised he'd picked up every time.
translation: 在我意识到史蒂芬·霍金每次都会接电话之前，我已经给他留了八条语音邮件了。<|im_end|>

joke: My terrible Joke but I never forget it. A dyslexic man walked into a bra....
translation: 这是一个糟糕的笑话，但我永远忘不掉。一个阅读障碍的人走进了一件……<|im_end|>

joke: Believe it or not, my wife and I were actually matched on Tinder. We'd been married for 12 years.
translation: 相信不相信，我和我妻子其实是在 Tinder 上匹配成功的。我们已经结婚十二年了。<|im_end|>

joke: I scream, you scream, we all scream for ice cream. This kid working at Baskin Robbins is pretty scared. Now he's crying in the corner.
translation: 我喊，你喊，大家都喊着要吃冰淇淋。现在在芭士可丹奴工作的小朋友可真是害怕，他在角落里哭了起来。<|im_end|>

joke: So a Trabi owner pulls up to a gas station... ...and says to the attendant: "Two windscreen wipers for my Trabi please." The attendant replies: "That sounds like a good deal!"
translation: 于是，一位捷达车车主开车来到一个加油站，他对服务员说：“请给我捷达车装两个前挡风玻璃刮水器。”服务员回答说：“这听起来是个不错的交易！”<|im_end|>

joke: How many police officers does it take to change a light bulb? None, because they'll just beat the room for being black!
translation: 多少警察才能换一个灯泡？一个都不用，因为他们只会把房间里的黑人赶走！<|im_end|>

joke: Why did the semen cross the road? Because I put on the wrong pair of socks this morning.
translation: 为什么精液要过马路？因为今天早上我穿错了袜子。<|im_end|>

joke: If you're not one of the first five boys in the yard, you almost never get a milkshake.
translation: 如果不在院子前五名之内，你就几乎没有机会得到一杯奶昔。<|im_end|>

joke: Every woman I've ever been with only saw me the way they wanted to see me... ...in their rearview mirror.
translation: 我曾经交往过的每一位女性，都只是从她们自己的后视镜里看到我。<|im_end|>

joke: How do you figure out which contestant in a Ms. America pageant is a prostitute? Look for the one with the sash that says "I da ho".
translation: 在美国小姐选美大赛中，你怎么能分辨出哪个参赛小姐是妓女呢？ look for the one 戴着写有“我是妓女”的绶带。<|im_end|>

joke: I love raccoons. Part cat. Part dog. Part rodent. Part bear. Little people hands. What's not to like?
translation: 译文：我喜欢浣熊，浣熊是部分像猫，部分像狗，部分像啮齿目动物，部分像熊，还有小浣熊手爪特别可爱，还有什么能不喜欢呢？<|im_end|>

joke: [Google search history] Moles How to kill moles How to make homemade bombs Rescue moles from cave-in Dealing with regret Mole stew
translation: 输入：[谷歌搜索历史] 捕杀鼹鼠 如何制作炸弹 营救坍塌中的鼹鼠 处理悔恨 鼹鼠炖肉描述：这段搜索历史描述了一系列令人费解和矛盾的搜索词条，似乎反映了一个人复杂的心理状态。<|im_end|>

joke: Standing in the park, I was wondering why a Frisbee gets larger the closer it gets. And then it hit me.
translation: 我在公园里站着，纳闷为什么飞盘越飞越近似乎越大。然后我领悟了。<|im_end|>

joke: When in doubt, just do the opposite of whatever the person wearing pajamas in public is doing.
translation: 如果感到迷茫，就去做穿睡衣的人在公共场合不会做的事情。<|im_end|>

joke: [Ouija board] Spirits are you there? U R C U T E D O Y O U H A V E K I K *flips board*
translation: [奥卡贾板] 灵魂们，你们在吗？你们就是被切割的那个，你用的姿势太MAN了*板子翻了起来*<|im_end|>

joke: Not being able to read because your book ran out of batteries is a pretty hilarious first-world problem.
translation: 因为书没电了而读不了书，这真是一个很幽默的发达国家问题。<|im_end|>

joke: My internet connection on my farm was be terrible until I moved the router in the horse barn. Now I have stable WiFi.
translation: 我搬到农场马厩里放路由器之前，上网都特别慢。现在我有了稳定的WiFi。<|im_end|>

joke: What does a sheep call a film it doesn't like? a baaahhhd movie. (   )
translation: 一只羊不喜欢的电影叫什么？糟糕的电影（baaahhhd movie）。<|im_end|>

joke: Brexit There is a new slimming product in town. It is called Brexit. It'll help you lose a lot of pounds.
translation: 脱欧——现在城里出现了一种新的减肥产品，叫做脱欧。使用它能帮你减轻很多体重。<|im_end|>

joke: Orange Julius is the third best thing to happen to oranges behind mimosas and the "orange you glad I didn't say banana" knock knock joke
translation: 橙汁是橙子发生的第三件好事，排在模拟酒和“你认为我没有说到香蕉而感到高兴吗？”的双关笑话之后。<|im_end|>

joke: Why do golfers wear 2 pairs of pants? Incase he gets a hole in one
translation: 为什么 golfer 会穿两件裤子？万一进洞了（ Hole in one ）就不用尴尬了。<|im_end|>

joke: How do you stop a baby from crawling in circles? Nail its other hand to the floor.
translation: 怎样才能让一个婴儿不再环状爬行？把另一个手钉在地板上。<|im_end|>

joke: Two fish are in a tank... One is driving, and the other is manning the guns.
translation: 两条鱼在游泳池里，一条在开车，一条在操作枪支。<|im_end|>

joke: Steve wrote home. 'I'm glad you named me  Steve' he said in the letter. 'Why?' asked his mother in her reply. 'Because that's what all the kids at camp call me' he wrote  back.
translation: 史蒂夫给家里写了封信。“我很高兴你给我取名史蒂夫，”他在信中这样写道。“为什么呢？”母亲在回信中问道。“因为夏令营里的孩子们都这样叫我，”史蒂夫回信说。<|im_end|>

joke: Whilst at college I did experiment with marijuana. I did it in snow, I did it in sleet, but I did not in hail. ^-- ^Ed ^Byrne
translation: 我在上学的时候曾经尝试吸过大麻，我在雪地里吸过大麻，我在冻雨里吸过大麻，但我没有在冰雹里吸过大麻。^-- ^Ed ^Byrne<|im_end|>

joke: I paid 10.50 for a movie ticket to watch Tom Cruise die continuously for 2 hours. I would have paid a hundred dollars to watch that.
translation: 我花了10.5元买电影票，看了两小时汤姆·克鲁斯不断死去。如果可以的话，我愿意付一百元看这样的电影。<|im_end|>

joke: A Spanish magician announced that for his final trick, he would vanish into thin air. He counted down: uno, dos, then POOF! He was gone, without a tres.
translation: 一位西班牙魔术师宣布他的最后一个魔术是消失在空气中。他倒数着：uno，dos，然后POOF！他真的消失了，连tres都没有听到。<|im_end|>

joke: Is that mine? I was walking down the street when I saw black guy with a laptop. Is that mine? I thought. It looks exactly like mine... but that can't be... Mine should be at home cleaning my shoes.
translation: 输入：那是我的吗？我走在街上，看到一个黑人 guy 在用一台笔记本电脑。那是我的吗？我想，它看起来就像我的那台……可是那不可能……我的应该在家里帮我擦鞋呢。注：这里的"guy"在中文里被替换成了"人"，因为"guy"在英文里是"家伙"的意思，带有贬义，而"黑人 guy"可能引起歧义，所以这里用"黑人"加上"人"来表达。同时，"black guy"在中文中可能不太自然，因此直接用"黑人"来描述。<|im_end|>

joke: A Bug's Mind What's the last thing that goes through a bug's mind when he crashes into a windshield? His asshole.
translation: 一只虫子的末路 当虫子撞到挡风玻璃上的最后一 thoughts 在想什么？ 就是他的屁股~<|im_end|>

joke: My mom recently bought a Jesus shaped flashlight When I asked her why she said: So whenever someone says "I can't see" I can be like "here, let Jesus light the path"
translation: 最近我妈妈买了一个耶稣形的 flashlight。当我问她为什么买时，她回答说：“这样每当有人抱怨‘我看不到’的时候，我就可以回答说‘让我让耶稣来照亮你的路’。”<|im_end|>

joke: Why is my Chinese girlfriend so bitchy? Well it's true, you are what you eat.
translation: 为什么我的中国女朋友那么 bitch（刻薄）？因为她吃的东西决定了她是什么样的人。<|im_end|>

joke: The hotel we stayed in for our holiday offered bed and board but it was impossible to say which was the bed and which was the board.
translation: 我们在度假时住的旅馆提供食宿，但很难分清什么是床，什么是食物。<|im_end|>

joke: My new cooking show, "Will Sasso Cooks With His Exposed Dick Really Close to the Food" premieres tonight (8/7 Central) in my mind. Be there!
translation: 我的新烹饪节目，“Will Sasso 使用他的暴露的棒子近距离接触食物烹饪秀”今晚（中部时间）首播（8/7）。我在想象中已经到场了！<|im_end|>

joke: *nose hairs growing out of control *buys tiny scissors *jam them in the eyes of whoever I catch staring at my nose hairs
translation: *鼻毛疯长 *买了一把小剪刀 *发现有人盯着我的鼻毛看就插进对方眼睛里<|im_end|>

joke: I'm trying to write a poem for my girlfriend, does anyone know what rhymes with threesome?
translation: 我正在给我女朋友写情诗，不知道“三俗”这个词有没有押韵？<|im_end|>

joke: Pro tip: If a woman asks you how she looks, the correct answer is not "like Dan Aykroyd."
translation: 提示：如果一个女人问你她长得怎么样，正确的回答不是“像丹·艾克罗伊德”。<|im_end|>

joke: I complained to my wife that I was short staffed at work She responded "yeah, and you have the same problem at home"
translation: 我对妻子抱怨说人手不够，她回答说：“是啊，而且你在家里面也有同样的问题。”<|im_end|>

joke: I overheard two female coworkers say there was a creepy dude listening to their conversation.
translation: 我听到两个女同事说有一个 creep 在偷听她们的谈话。<|im_end|>

joke: What's black and white and red all over and can't get through a revolving door? A nun with a spear through her head.
translation: 描述：为什么一个头上中了长矛的修女无法穿过旋转门？因为它又黑又白还遍体鳞伤（plays on the phrase “black and white and red all over” which in Chinese means “又黑又白还红彤彤” implying injuries or blood, and the image of a spear through her head）。<|im_end|>

joke: What did the Marine Biologist say when he saw two eels making love? "It's a Moray."
translation: 海洋生物学家看到两条鳗鱼在谈恋爱时会说什么？海洋生物学家说：“这就是一条Moray。”<|im_end|>

joke: I submitted 10 of my best puns to a Joke competition expecting at least 1 to win, but... No pun in ten did..
translation: 我提交了自己认为最好的10个双关笑话参加一个比赛，本以为至少可以让一个双关笑话获奖，但结果是……十个双关都没有笑点……<|im_end|>

joke: Shoutout to people who don't know what the opposite of in is. I'll give you some time for this one.
translation: 这个笑话是让那些不知道“与‘in’相对的词是什么”的人来猜一猜。这个问题需要一些时间来思考。<|im_end|>

joke: ME: all the King's horses and men couldn't put u back together HUMPTY DUMPTY: what now M: [opening package of bacon] I'll think of something
translation: 输入：ME：所有的国王的马和士兵都无法把你拼回去。  HUMPTY DUMPTY：现在怎么办？  ME：（打开一份培根） 我自然有办法。  描述：Humpty Dumpty是童话故事中的一个角色，此处是对原文的幽默翻译。<|im_end|>

joke: How many Alzheimer's patients does it take to screw on a light bulb? TO GET TO THE OTHER SIDE!
translation: 这个笑话是这样的：换灯泡需要几个老年痴呆患者？需要“换灯泡”（to get to the other side，在英语中有“换灯泡”和“到达彼岸”的双关意）！<|im_end|>

joke: If chopsticks were really better than a fork... ...wouldn't we be digging ditches with pool cues?
translation: 如果筷子真的比叉子好用... ...那我们用球杆挖沟是不是更好呢?<|im_end|>

joke: First woman on the moon W: Houston, we have a problem H: What is it? W: Nevermind its nothing H: What is the problem? W: Nothing... H: Tell us what the problem is! W: NO!
translation: 登月第一女宇航员W：休斯敦，我们出了个问题。H：什么问题？W：没事，没事。H：到底出了什么问题？W：没...没事！<|im_end|>

joke: Thank god I have the newest, fastest iPhone so I can mindlessly check the same three apps 500 times a day.
translation: 谢天谢地，我用的是最新型号的iPhone，这样我就可以一天不落地傻傻地打开同一个三款应用程序500次了。<|im_end|>

joke: Jared Fogle was guilty and got 16 years He was just grateful for anything under 18. Credit to SNL that joke might have converted me to watch.
translation: 杰拉德·福格勒有罪了，判了16年，他都感恩已经少于18年了。感谢《周六夜现场》，这个梗让我有了观看的意愿。<|im_end|>

joke: This hating of people who breast feed in public places has to stop! I'll raise my dog however I like.
translation: 公共场所里给孩子喂奶真的不该被讨厌！我喂我的狗我也想怎么喂就怎么喂。<|im_end|>

joke: A woman's JJ sized breasts saved her life in a car accident. Those same breasts were the cause of her husbands death in a motorboating accident.
translation: 一位妇女在车祸中因胸部较大得以保命，但在一次摩托艇事故中，同样的胸部却成了导致她丈夫死亡的原因。<|im_end|>

joke: Recent studies show that 1 out of 3 Americans weigh as much as the other 2 put together.
translation: 一项新的研究显示,美国人的体重分布是其中三分之一的人体重等于其他三分之二人的体重之和。<|im_end|>

joke: [date gets back from the bathroom] those batman toys in the tub are so cute! How old are your kids? "kids?"
translation: 【约会对象从洗手间回来】浴缸里的蝙蝠侠玩具好可爱啊！你有小孩吗？“小孩？”<|im_end|>

joke: I just Googled 'Nicolas Cage jokes' and it showed me a list of every film he's been in. Well played, Google.
translation: 我刚刚在谷歌上搜索“尼古拉斯·凯奇的笑话”，结果它给我展示了一部他参演过的电影列表。谷歌，你真是聪明。<|im_end|>

joke: I've been listening to the official workout station on Pandora for 3 months and I'm still fat, I'm calling bullshit.
translation: 我在 Pandora 上听了官方健身电台三个月了，还是segue到大肚便便，我要举报这是假的！<|im_end|>

joke: I was going to break up a fight between two Rabbis... But they were just arguing semitics.
translation: 本想干预两位拉比之间的打斗……但他们争论的只是 Semitism（语源学）。<|im_end|>

joke: Pavlov's doorbell One tuesday afternoon Ivan Pavlov is reading the paper, when his neighbour rings the doorbell. Ivan jumps up out of his chair, suddenly remembering: "Shit, I need to feed the dogs!"
translation: 巴甫洛夫的门铃 有一天，巴甫洛夫正在看报，突然邻居按了门铃。巴甫洛夫从椅子上跳了起来，恍然大悟：“糟了，该给狗们喂食了！”<|im_end|>

joke: What did one tampon say to the other tampon? Nothing they were both stuck up cunts.
translation: 月经带版：一个卫生棉条对另一个卫生棉条说了什么？它们两个都没说话，因为它们都被塞在那里了。<|im_end|>

joke: HER: You look so nervous. ME: *nervously* HA. I'm never nervous. HER: You're sweating. ME: *just freaking out* That's bravery moisture.
translation: 她：你看起来好紧张。我：（紧张地）哈，我从不紧张。她：你都出汗了。我：（故意夸张）那是勇敢的汗水。<|im_end|>

joke: When I was 8 years old, my dad got me with the worst dad joke ever. He said he was going to the store and would be back soon...
translation: 当我8岁的时候，我爸爸给我讲了最糟糕的爸爸笑话。他说他要去商店，很快就回来……<|im_end|>

joke: Do you hate yourself? Do you wish someone would trip you down stairs? Do you enjoy lacerations & and surprise vomit piles? *hands you a cat*
translation: 你恨自己吗？你希望有人能把你推下楼梯吗？你喜欢自残和惊喜呕吐堆吗？那我送你一只猫吧。<|im_end|>

joke: I found where my mom hid the scissors, so everyone in my house woke up with a new haircut this morning.
translation: 我把妈妈藏剪刀的地方找到了，所以今天早上我们家每个人都得到了一个新的发型。<|im_end|>

joke: What is the best thing about twenty six year olds? There are twenty of them
translation: 26岁人的最大优点是什么？他们中有二十个人。<|im_end|>

joke: Why was there semen on the clean laundry? When Greg woke up, his mom had left a note reading, "Please put a load in the washer"
translation: 为什么干净的洗衣单上会有精液？格雷格醒来后，发现妈妈留了一张纸条：“请放一袋进去洗一洗。”<|im_end|>

joke: I once was bored so I decided to eat a clock to *pass the time*. It was very *time consuming*. Yuk yuk yuk yuk yuk
translation: 我曾经无聊过，于是决定吃一个钟表来消磨时间。那可真是费时费力啊。 Yuk yuk yuk yuk yuk<|im_end|>

joke: Have you ever seen those "Give a penny, take a penny" things at convenience stores??? that makes no cents
translation: 你见过那些便利店里“投一枚，取一枚”的零钱盒子吗？那玩意儿一点意义都没有。<|im_end|>

joke: Me: .... Dog: ... Me: .... Dog: ... Me: ... Dog: ... Me: .... Dog: ... Me: ... Dog: ... Me: ... Dog: have the shrooms kicked-in yet? Me: ..
translation: 输入：我：…… 狗：…… 我：…… 狗：…… 我：…… 狗：…… 我：…… 狗：菇凉们进场了没？ 我：……描述：这是一个利用文字谐音开的低俗玩笑，不适合所有场合。在中文里，“菇凉们”是对“姑娘们”的一种网络用语谐音梗，而“有shiroom踢门了没”则是“有没有shi（尿）room（洗手间）了”的谐音梗。因此，这个笑话的梗在于利用了两种不同的谐音来制造幽默，但在很多情况下被认为是不恰当的。<|im_end|>

joke: I bet if I were a MAN Apple wouldn't tell me my password ideas are weak.
translation: 我打赌，如果我是个男人，苹果公司就不会说我密码的想法太弱了。<|im_end|>

joke: if people really didn't want to hear smartass responses they wouldn't keep asking questions like "do you know why i pulled you over?"
translation: 如果人们真的不想听到 smarty-pants 的回答，他们就不会老是问“你知道我为什么要停车检查你吗？”这类问题了。 注：smartass 在中文里通常翻译为 smarty-pants，用来形容那些喜欢卖弄聪明、爱开玩笑的人。<|im_end|>

joke: I have this fun drinking game where you take a drink every time you'd like one because you're an adult and you can make decisions yourself.
translation: 这有个有趣的饮酒游戏，在你觉得作为成年人应该喝酒的时候，就应该喝一杯。<|im_end|>

joke: I'm sorry, Black Lives Matter is actually a peaceful and forward thinking movement that our society needs... Now if you could all stop sending me death threats on twitter that would be great.
translation: 抱歉，黑人的命也是命其实是一个和平且有前瞻性的运动，我们的社会确实需要这样的运动……如果你们能停止给我发死亡威胁就更好了。<|im_end|>

joke: My girlfriend left me after I broke her wheelchair..... Oh,, I think she'll come crawling back soon..
translation: 我女朋友因为我在她轮椅上摔了一跤而和我分手了……哦，我想她不会太久就会求我回来的。<|im_end|>

joke: Someone should invent a version of Twitter for people who spell things like rappers. They could call it "twita". Dat would b nize
translation: 有人应该发明一个类似于Twitter的社交平台，但专门为那些单词拼写像饶舌歌手一样的人们设计，他们可以叫它“twita”。那样的话会很有趣。<|im_end|>

joke: NSFW Men are like a deck of cards... You need a heart to love him, a diamond to marry him, a club to smash his fucking face in and a spade to bury the bastard!
translation: 这种荤段子可以说是非常低俗了，直译可能会失去原有的幽默感，而且可能不适合所有场合。下面是一个尽量保留原意的中文版本：男人就像一副扑克牌，需要一颗红心来爱他，一方来嫁他，黑桃用来教训他的脸，而梅花则用来埋这个混蛋！请注意，这个翻译仍然包含非常粗俗的内容，使用时需谨慎。<|im_end|>

joke: THE HORROR! *splat THE TRAGEDY! *splat IT'S AWFUL! *splat SO MUCH BLOOD! *splat WHY IS THIS HAPPENING?! *splat -It's raining men.
translation: 啊！恐怖！ *扑通  tragedy！ *扑通  太糟糕了！ *扑通  太多血了！ *扑通  为什么事情会这样?! *扑通 - 正在下雨呢（注：这里的“men”谐音“men”意为“下雨了”，而中文的“男人”也有类似发音，所以这里是一种双关）<|im_end|>

joke: Guy comes home with a flower bouquet... "Guess I'll have to spread my legs now", says the wife. "Why? Don't you have a vase?" the husband replies.
translation: 一个男人带了一束花回家……“那我得把大腿分开让你看了。”妻子说。“为什么？你没有花瓶吗？”丈夫问道。<|im_end|>

joke: Two rabbits were being chased by a pack of wild dogs... One says to the other "should we stop and outnumber them?" ... &nbsp; "keep running you fool we're brothers!!"
translation: 两只兔子正被一群野狗追赶……其中一只对另一只说：“我们应该停下来和他们打一架吗？” 另一只回答说：“别傻了快跑，我们是亲兄弟！”<|im_end|>

joke: No one is more unnecessarily confident than a white person that just ordered Mexican food in a Spanish accent.
translation: 一个刚用西班牙语发音点墨西哥食物的白人是最不必要自信的人。<|im_end|>

joke: What do you call it when two designers argue about what file type to export a graphic to? Getting into a bit of a .tiff!
translation: 两名设计师在讨论导出图形时应使用哪种文件类型，结果却争论不休，这叫作陷入了“.tiff”困境！<|im_end|>

joke: A doctor reaches into his pocket and finds his rectal thermometer He says "Shit, some asshole took my pen!"
translation: 医生把手伸进口袋，发现里面是个肛温计，于是他说：“该死的，某个混蛋把我的钢笔拿走了！”<|im_end|>

joke: how many people does it take to save the world? zero (compliments to my SO who thinks she made this up)
translation: 拯救世界需要几个人？零（献给我的SO，她认为这个笑话是自己想出来的）<|im_end|>

joke: Finally got around to shaving my crotch after a few years. Its nice to see my knees again.

joke: I'm ready for the cop-buddy film where they actually get along in the beginning but hate each other by the end.
translation: 我期待着看一部警探 buddy 影片，一开始他们相处得很好，但到结尾时却互相讨厌。<|im_end|>

joke: How many people does it take to change a light bulb in Brazil? A Brazillion!!! http://imgur.com/c4CJjUd
translation: 巴西有多少人换灯泡呢？一打（亿）！！！[http://imgur.com/c4CJjUd]<|im_end|>

joke: If two people had a race and one had sand in his shoe but the other did not, who would win? The one with sand in his shoe -- if it was quicksand.
translation: 如果有两个人进行比赛, 其中一个人的鞋子里有沙子, 但是另外一个人的鞋子里没有, 谁会赢呢? 鞋子里有沙子的那个人——如果那是流沙的话。<|im_end|>

joke: I know dream catchers don't work because I've never seen one in a car worth more than two thousand dollars.
translation: 我知道梦之网是不管用的，因为从来没见过值两千元以上的车里装着梦之网。<|im_end|>

joke: At my last checkup the doctor said he needed a urine sample, a semen sample and a stool sample ... ... I said " Doc, I can speed this along - I'll just leave you my underwear !"

joke: [pulls out acoustic guitar at a funeral] alright everyone stop being all [finger quotes] sad this next 1 is dedicated to a very sexy widow.
translation: [在葬礼上拿出 acoustic guitar] 好了大家别这么[finger quotes]伤心了，下一首是献给一位非常性感的寡妇的。<|im_end|>

joke: If there are three gay guys in a bath and a lump of cum floats to the surface, what do they say? Who farted?
translation: 如果有三个gay男的在洗澡，然后有一坨精液漂到了水面上，他们其中一个人会说：谁放屁了？<|im_end|>

joke: Why the gills in the sea don't drink tea even though there is plenty of water That will make them all guill tea!
translation: 为什么海里的鱼虽然有好多水可以喝茶，但他们就是不喝“guill tea”！<|im_end|>

joke: Taking calculus has made me want to become Prime Minister of a European country Then I can just throw money at problems instead of trying to integrate them.
translation: 描述：学习微积分让我想成为某个欧洲国家的首相，那样一来就可以用钱解决问题，而不用去一一解决（化解）它们。<|im_end|>

joke: My friend used my todo list to roll a blunt He's high on my list of priorities
translation: 我的朋友用我的待办事项列表卷了一根烟，现在他在我需要优先处理的事情列表里了。<|im_end|>

joke: From now on when skinny girls say they're fat I'm just gonna be like, "Yup" & walk away.
translation: 从现在开始，当我遇到瘦弱的女孩说她胖的时候，我就点点头然后走开。<|im_end|>

joke: How many people with dementia does it take to change a lightbulb? To get to the other side.

joke: butts are truly the final frontier. to think we know more about SPACE than we do about the human butt. two fleshy mounds of mystery & wonder

joke: I keep getting the urge to purchase a big white bear from the artic... ...Doc says I might have "Buy Polar" disorder! EDIT: arctic*

joke: How do you get a gay man to fuck a woman? Shit in her cunt.
translation: 这种 joke 充满了对同性恋群体的歧视和侮辱，把他们当作笑料和攻击的对象，同时涉及性侵犯和不雅内容。我不会将其翻译或进一步描述，而是建议我们尊重所有人，并避免发表或传播带有歧视、侮辱性质的内容。<|im_end|>

joke: I want to start a coffee shop that only plays ambient/electronic music... and call it Brian Beano.

joke: I like my girlfriend's new glow-in-the-dark braces... ...her smile really lights up the room now.

joke: Mom writes to her son in Poland's army: "Dear Son, I am writing this letter ever so slowly..... ....because I know you cannot read fast"

joke: Did you hear about the calendar thief? He got 12 months; they say his days are numbered!

joke: I hate how the losers of every election maintain such a high view of themselves... They're conceded
translation: 每次选举结束后，那些loser们总是那么自我感觉良好……他们应该已经被淘汰了。<|im_end|>

joke: I didn't see mommy kiss Santa, but my sister saw her kiss the mailman, which explains why I'm the only one with brown eyes in the family

joke: Why did the vampire attack the clown? He wanted the circus to be in his blood.
translation: 吸血鬼为什么袭击小丑？因为他想让马戏团进入自己的血液。<|im_end|>

joke: How do I know when your sister's on her period..... Your dad's dick taste like blood

joke: What do you call going Doctor to Doctor... What do you call going Doctor to Doctor to figure out what your inflammatory bowel disease is called? A Game of Crohn's.
translation: 输入：医生问医生：你叫什么名字？你叫医生问医生——你在看医生的过程中，为了弄清楚自己患的是克罗恩病还是溃疡性结肠炎而咨询了多位医生，这叫什么？这就叫“克罗恩病之战”（A Game of Crohn's）。<|im_end|>

joke: What's the difference between a pizza and a black man? The pizza can feed a family of 4.

joke: If you hear the words "oh yeah, suck it" coming from my bedroom, it's probably just me vacuuming.
translation: 如果从我卧室里传来“哦yeah，吸它吧”的声音，那很可能我只是在用吸尘器打扫。<|im_end|>

joke: A photon walks into a hotel The bell boy walks up and asks, "Do you have any luggage?". "No," says the photon, "I'm traveling light."
translation: 一个光子走进一家酒店，门童迎了上来，问道：“您有行李吗？”光子回答说：“没有，我一身轻装。”<|im_end|>

joke: People always complain that I'm "out there." [On the phone. To the cops. While I'm sitting in their birdbath.]

joke: *job interview* Why do you want to be a psychiatrist? *pictures clients acting like chickens after I click my fingers* I want to help people

joke: "911, what's your emergency?" Me: A cute guy at the laundromat walked past me while I was folding my period underwear.

joke: Dog's Facebook status: Tried to save the master from the vacuum cleaner today... He just yelled at me.
translation: 狗的 FACEBOOK 状态更新：今天我试着拯救主人免受吸尘器的伤害……他 just 喊了我一声。<|im_end|>

joke: What is the term for a group of Canadians? Is it "an apology"? "Oh look, there goes an apology of Canadians"

joke: Trump wants to appoint Ben Carson to the Department of Education, but I think he would do better in the FDA He can feed everyone with all of the grain in those pyramids.

joke: Putting a woman on a $10 makes sense . . . . . . no one really wants a 1 or a 5. (As heard on Wait, Wait, Don't Tell Me)
translation: 把一个女人印在10元钞票上是讲得通的……谁也不会真的想要1元或者5元的钞票。（来自Wait, Wait, Don't Tell Me）<|im_end|>

joke: I always check my smoke alarms to make sure they're working. I call it "cooking"
translation: 我总是检查烟雾报警器确保它们正常工作。我管这叫“烹饪”。<|im_end|>

joke: [wife looking at pictures of my dead body with police] "why isn't he wearing a shirt" we believe he removed it when he challenged the coyote

joke: I just found out I am a hipster Because I started using #NotMyPresident 8 years ago.
translation: 因为八年前我就开始使用#NotMyPresident，所以我知道自己是个潮人了。<|im_end|>

joke: What's the difference between a computer and a woman? A computer only has to have information punched into it once.
translation: 计算机和女人有什么区别？计算机里的信息只需要输入一次。<|im_end|>

joke: How to meet a girl: 1) Walk into a bar. 2) Shout "Heroes in a half shell." 3) When a girl yells back "Turtle Power," marry her.
translation: 如何遇到女孩：1）走进酒吧。2）大喊：“豪利半壳龟。”3）当有女孩应和“龟 Power”，你就娶了她。描述：<|im_end|>

joke: What's the sharpest thing in the word? A fart. It goes right through your pants and doesn't leave a hole.

joke: *calls into work* "yo boss i'm real sick" "you don't sound sick..." "ya, just got a new tribal tat & heelys" "wow u do sound hella sick"

joke: I'm not saying that girl's a slut... But she has touched more wieners than Heinz ketchup.
translation: 我不是在说那个女孩是荡妇……但是她的手摸过的“ wiener ”比亨兹热狗肠还要多。<|im_end|>

joke: how are a silver medalist and a priest alike They both came in a little behind
translation: 银牌得主和牧师有什么共同点？他们两个都稍逊一步。<|im_end|>

joke: Saw a homeless guy babbling about conspiracy theories that doesn't really make sense... You could say it was a vague rant.
translation: 看到一个无家可归的人在念叨一些毫无意义的阴谋论，可以说是一通含糊其辞的乱谈。<|im_end|>

joke: Blessed are those who are cracked, for they are the ones who let in the light!
translation: 有裂缝的才是幸福的，因为裂缝才让光芒照了进来！<|im_end|>

joke: Remember before Amazon reviews when you could just buy a toothbrush without 6 hours of research?
translation: 还记得亚马逊刚兴起的时候，买个牙刷都不用花6个小时做研究的吗？<|im_end|>

joke: Don't judge me because I like 80's music. Judge me because I had a late term abortion because a baby would ruin my holiday plans.

joke: When someone uses the bathroom and asks about the wine cork floating in the toilet is why I don't invite people to my house.

joke: An infectious disease enters a bar... the bartender says,"we dont serve your kind here". The disease replies, "well you're not a very good host!"
translation: 一个传染性疾病走进一家酒吧……酒馆老板说：“这里不招待你们这种人。”疾病回答说：“那你们可不够热情好客！”<|im_end|>

joke: If four out of five people suffer from radiation poisoning... Does that mean the fifth one enjoys it?
translation: 如果五个人中有四个人患有辐射中毒……那么剩下的第五个人是不是很喜欢这个感觉？<|im_end|>

joke: Having the option to erase and re-record after having to leave a voicemail is one of my favorite things about life.
translation: 能够在留语音邮件的时候有重录的功能，是我生活中最喜欢的功能之一。<|im_end|>

joke: Well it's like my dad always told me "When life gives ya lemons" Chances are you're in the fruit aisle.
translation: 就像我爸爸常跟我说的：“生活给你柠檬的话” 那你很可能是在水果区。<|im_end|>

joke: I just saw the Assassins Creed Movie Trailer... I did not expect The Spanish Inquisition.
translation: 我刚刚看了刺客信条的预告片……我没想到会有西班牙围攻出现。<|im_end|>

joke: Why do Canadians do it doggy style? So they can both watch the hockey game.
translation: 为什么加拿大人喜欢狗儿式？因为他们可以一边做爱一边看冰球赛。<|im_end|>

joke: Dad and son A son asks his father "Why does my bum hurt" while the father replies "Because I love you son"
translation: 儿子问爸爸：“为什么我的屁股疼”，爸爸回答说：“因为我爱你，儿子”。<|im_end|>

joke: A programmer began to cuss Because getting to sleep was a fuss. When laying in her bed Looping round in her head Was: while (!asleep()): sheep++;
translation: 一个程序员开始骂人，因为她上床之后入睡很困难。她躺在床上辗转反侧，脑海里浮现的都是这样的代码片段：`while (!asleep()): sheep++;`<|im_end|>

joke: I see you've got your bill for using the Internet Yes and my dad's really going to get the hump!

joke: We're all born with scars. from the moment we open our eyes and look at the world we are wounded, we all share that same mark... Bellybuttons.
translation: 我们生来就带着伤痕。从我们睁开眼看待这个世界开始，我们就已经受伤了，我们都有同一种伤痕……肚脐。<|im_end|>

joke: How many hipsters does it take to change a lightbulb... It's quite an obscure number you probably would not have heard of it.
translation: 有多少hipster才能换一个灯泡……这可是个相当冷门的数字，你可能都没听说过。<|im_end|>

joke: The world is becoming too politically correct You can't even say black paint anymore, instead you have to say "Lamar can you please paint the fence".
translation: 翻译输入：这个世界上政治正确得也未免太过了，连黑漆都敢不说，而是让你说“拉马尔，你能帮我刷下围栏不”。描述：这个世界未免也太政治正确了吧，连说黑漆都不行了，还得说“拉马尔，你能帮我刷下围栏不”。<|im_end|>

joke: *pulls out earbud* What? "We need to talk." *pulls out earbud* "You've been spending too much time at Chernobyl." *pulls out earbud* No way
translation: *拉出耳塞*什么？“我们需要谈谈。”*拉出耳塞*“你花在切尔诺贝利的时间太多了。”*拉出耳塞*不可能的。<|im_end|>

joke: Barbie comes with GI Joe She only fakes it with Ken. Saw plenty of pregnant Barbie jokes in this sub-reddit, but not this one.
translation: 芭比娃娃附贈有GI JOE玩偶，她只在和Ken玩偶做假装的游戏。我在这个子版块看到了很多关于怀孕的芭比娃娃的笑话，但是没有这个笑话。<|im_end|>

joke: The economy is doing really bad... Its so bad that when Bill and Hillary Clinton travel, they have to share a room.
translation: 经济状况真的很差……差到比尔和希拉里·克林顿出行时都不得不合住一个房间。<|im_end|>

joke: Why don't north Koreans listen to funk? Cos they've got no Seoul! Thank you very much.
translation: 输入：为什么朝鲜人不听放克音乐？因为他们没有首尔！谢谢！描述：这段英文笑话的中文翻译为：为什么朝鲜人不听放克音乐？因为他们没有首尔！谢谢！<|im_end|>

joke: *LIGHTHOUSE* BATMAN - You call? L/HOUSE KEEPER - Shit, not again man. I am so sorry. BATMAN - Dead seagull on the light? LK -*Nods*
translation: 灯塔*（蝙蝠侠拨通了灯塔管理员的电话）蝙蝠侠：你那边有信号吗？灯塔管理员：***糟了，又是你，蝙蝠侠。实在对不起。蝙蝠侠：灯塔顶上有只死海鸥？灯塔管理员：***点头回应。<|im_end|>

joke: I don't care if you don't like space puns. I like space puns. Comet me bro.
translation: 我不在乎你喜不喜欢太空相关的双关，我喜欢。来个彗星吧，兄弟。<|im_end|>

joke: What did one deer say to the other after leaving the bar? I can't believe you just blew 50 bucks in there
translation: 一只鹿在离开酒吧之后对另一只鹿说了什么？我简直不敢相信，你在那里刚花了50美元。<|im_end|>

joke: My necrophiliac girlfriend told me I was dead to her. That is the nicest thing anyone has ever said to me.
translation: 我的亡命之徒女友告诉我她已经不爱我了。这是有人对我说过的最温柔的话了。<|im_end|>

joke: How many egoists does it take to change a lightbulb? One. They simply hold the bulb and wait for the world to revolve around them.
translation: 描述：多少自我中心的人可以换灯泡？一个，他们拿着灯泡等着世界围绕他们转。<|im_end|>

joke: I'm Winston Wolf, I fix problems. So I hear you're having a bad hair day.
translation: 我是温斯顿·狼，我解决问题。听说你正在经历糟糕的一天？（原意为糟糕的发型，但为了更符合中文表达习惯，可以意译为糟糕的一天）<|im_end|>

joke: What's the difference between a lentil and a chickpea? [NSFW] I wouldn't pay five hundred dollars to have a lentil on my face.
translation: 这句话的意思是：鹰嘴豆和扁豆有什么区别？（NSFW）我不会花五百美元在脸上弄个扁豆。<|im_end|>

joke: Monday Morning......Rolling out of bed is easy. Getting up off  the floor is another story.
translation: 周一早上……从床上滚下来很容易，从地上爬起来可就难了。<|im_end|>

joke: What the hell is Minecraft? Hitler's lesser known, second, book about his love of knitting.
translation: 什么是《我的世界》？是希特勒那本鲜为人知的第二本书，书中记载了他对钩针编织的热爱。<|im_end|>

joke: My girlfriend is half my size but takes up three quarters of the bed. If my math is correct, she's a bitch
translation: 我的女朋友个子只有我的一半，却占了床上四分之三的位置。如果我的计算没错的话，她就是个母猪。<|im_end|>

joke: I like my women like I like my microwaves... Cold on the outside, warm on the inside, and willing and able to kill any baby I put inside them.
translation: 我喜欢我的女人，就像我喜欢微波炉一样，外面凉丝丝的，里面热乎乎的，而且愿意并且能够把我放进她们身体里的任何婴儿给干掉。<|im_end|>

joke: What did Kurt Kobain have such a terrible time in 7th grade? He was having a mid-life crisis.
translation: 这首歌坛巨星在七年级时为什么总是郁郁寡欢？因为他提前经历中年危机了。<|im_end|>

joke: 8: Daddy can we go to a haunted house tonight? Me: You spent the night at Grandmas last week. 8: What? Me: Nothing. 8: I'm telling mom.
translation: 输入：8：爸爸，我们今晚可以去鬼屋吗？我：你上星期还在奶奶家过夜。8：什么？我：没事。8：我要告诉妈妈。 描述：一个父亲试图阻止孩子去鬼屋，但是没有成功。<|im_end|>

joke: What has two eyes but can't see, two wings but can't fly, and two legs but can't walk? A dead bird.
translation: 这个笑话的中文翻译如下：什么有两个眼睛却看不见，有两个翅膀却飞不起来，还有两条腿却走不了路？死鸟。<|im_end|>

joke: Oh, you want me to watch everything you have in less than the one-month free trial period? Challenge accepted, Netflix.
translation: 哦，你想让我在一个月免费试用期还没结束之前就看光你所有的东西？奈飞，我接受了你的挑战。<|im_end|>

joke: I think my professor might not know my name. He keeps on correcting it with the word "Late" on all my papers.
translation: 我觉得我的教授可能根本不认识我，他在我的所有作业上都把我的名字改成了“Late”。<|im_end|>

joke: Cutest thing I saw today was the dad angrily slamming the sliding door of his minivan but it slowed down by itself and latched silently
translation: 今天最萌的一幕是一个爸爸生气地把迷你货车的滑动门关上了，但门自己慢了下来，然后安静地关上了。<|im_end|>

joke: I don't have a gf, but I do know a woman who in the car often asks where this is going so I show her the GPS & she gets mad for some reason.
translation: 我没有女朋友，但我知道有这么一个女人，她经常在开车的时候问“我们要去哪”，所以我试着把GPS给她用，但她不知为何却生气了。<|im_end|>

joke: it is hard to b scared of a angry person once u realize that they just wanted to tie a knot but insted of using string they used their arms
translation: 这个笑话的意思是：一旦你意识到一个生气的人只是想打个结，但却误用了胳膊代替绳子，你就很难再害怕他们了。以下是这种情况下的一种中文翻译：生气的人其实只是想打个结，却用胳膊代替了绳子，所以其实并不可怕。<|im_end|>

joke: What sound does a Chinese roller coaster make as it goes up an incline? chink chink chink chink
translation: 一个过山车在中国上升时会发出什么声音？叮叮当当。<|im_end|>

joke: A teacher walks into a bar Guy: can I buy you a drink? Teacher: I don't know, CAN you?
translation: 输入：老师走进酒吧。顾客：能请你喝一杯吗？老师：我不确定，你真的能吗？ 翻译：老师走进酒吧。顾客：能请你喝一杯吗？老师：说不准，你真的能请我喝吗？<|im_end|>

joke: When a cop pulls you over for a DUI at 2am on Friday night & tells you to walk the line-it's never good to start singing Johnny Cash songs.

joke: A Latino shot an unarmed black man today, and everyone is in an uproar Especially the police, saying "They took our jobs!"

joke: [interview] Your resume says you have a "take no prisoners attitude". You know you are applying to be a corrections officer, right?
translation: [面试] 你的简历上写着你有“不拘小节”的态度。你知道你在申请做狱警吧?<|im_end|>

joke: Spider: Why don't you like us? Most us are harmless and we kill all the bugs in your house? We just want to help Humans: EW EW EW EW OMG

joke: Let's make fake tan orange people an official race so we can discriminate against them properly.
translation: 让我们把假晒成橙色的人正式认定为一个种族，这样我们可以公正地歧视他们。<|im_end|>

joke: Why is there an eject button on the DVD remote? I still have to get up and take the disc out. It's like having a remote to open the fridge.
translation: 为什么DVD遥控器上有一个“弹出”键？因为我 still have to get up and take the disc out. 这就像遥控开门冰箱。<|im_end|>

joke: If I win this lottery I'd give half to charity She treated me well at the strip club

joke: I invented a SJW alarm clock. It not only tells you the time, it reminds you what year it is, too.
translation: 我发明了一个SJW闹钟，它不仅能告诉你时间，还能提醒你现在的年份是哪一年。<|im_end|>

joke: A Zach Galifinakis-style "impression" joke. The character I'm working on is: MOMENTARILY CONFUSED BATMAN <husky voice>: Alfred... <regular voice>: Ahem... I mean hey Alfred

joke: What's the difference between acetone and Hitler? One is used to remove the polish, and the other is used to remove the Polish.
translation: acetone 和希特勒有什么区别？一个是去光用的，另一个是用来驱逐波兰人的。<|im_end|>

joke: If two pharaohs farted at the same time They would have a toot in common
translation: 如果两个法老同时放屁，那么他们就有一个共同的屁。<|im_end|>

joke: How did the sad clown smile and laugh again? They told him his wife died recently.
translation: 为什么悲伤的 Clown 又笑了？因为他们告诉他他的妻子最近去世了。<|im_end|>

joke: Two cookies were walking across the road... ... one gets hit by a car, the other one says "ah crumbs..."
translation: 两个饼干在过马路……其中一个让车撞到了，另一个说“好巧，又有免费的饼干了……”<|im_end|>

joke: That one. "that one." says a booy. "what do you mean?" says another boy. "oh, i was just answering your question." "what question?" "i already told you."

joke: Need jokes with the same punchline as this. Help! What do you call a boomerang that doesn't come back? A stick.

joke: A grasshopper sits at the bar... ...and the bartender says, "Hey, we have a drink named after you!" The grasshopper says, "You have a drink named Steve?"
translation: 一只蚱蜢坐在吧台里……酒保说：“嘿，我们有一种酒是以你的名字命名的！”蚱蜢说：“你们有一种酒叫史蒂夫？”<|im_end|>

joke: Found out the difference between onions and men. I don't cry when I'm chopping up men.

joke: You wanna hear a dirty joke A horse fell in the mud. And then some crazy lesbian who hates horses put on a strap on and fucked it till it died.
translation: 这是一个不适宜的笑话，其中包含大量的侮辱性和冒犯性内容。我不会直接翻译这样的内容，因为它可能会冒犯他人或引起不适。让我们来分享一个更加积极和有趣的笑话吧。<|im_end|>

joke: I went to a fancy dress party as a calendar A guy came up to me and said "Your days are numbered"
translation: 我参加了一个化装舞会，化成了日历的样子。有一个 guy 走过来对我说：“你的日子屈指可数了”。<|im_end|>

joke: The Unabomber What do the Unabomber and a girl from Alabama have in common? They were both fingered by their brother.
translation: 未遂炸弹客未遂炸弹客和阿拉巴马州的一个女孩有什么共同点？他们都是被兄弟指认的。<|im_end|>

joke: Customer care: Your call is important to us, please hold on. Customer: *completes graduation* *gets a job* *gets married* *gets old* *dies*
translation: 客服：您的来电我们非常重视，请稍候。顾客：*顺利完成毕业* *找到工作* *结婚生子* *老去* *死亡*<|im_end|>
